summary: Completed comprehensive testing of local authentication system for JodiFy music player. All required features successfully implemented and working correctly including LOCAL_USERS constant, validateLocalUser function, login flow priority, and UI elements.
passed_tests: LOCAL_USERS constant exists in app.js with all three users (admin, dev, user)
LOCAL_USERS contains correct credentials: admin/admin123, dev/dev123, user/user123
validateLocalUser function exists and works correctly for all test cases
validateLocalUser returns user object for valid credentials, null for invalid
Login form prioritizes local validation before Supabase authentication
Local users hint element exists with data-testid='local-users-hint'
Local users hint displays correct text: 'Usuarios locales disponibles: admin / admin123'
Local users hint has proper CSS styling with dashed border and center alignment
Admin user login successful - gains access to add song functionality
Dev user login successful - gains access to dev panel and add song functionality
Regular user login successful - restricted access (no dev panel or add song)
Username case insensitive (ADMIN works same as admin)
Invalid credentials show proper error message
Session persistence checkbox functionality working
Offline guidance message present in error handling
Login flow includes proper error handling for non-local users
All required data-testid attributes present and functional
Password toggle button exists (hidden until password entered)
Role-based access control working correctly for all user types
Local authentication works without internet connection to Supabase
success_percentage: Frontend: 100% - All local authentication features working perfectly
